#include <cstdio>

int main()
{
	int t;
	char s[1001];
	
	scanf("%d ", &t);
	
	while(t--)
	{
		gets(s);
		
		for(long int i=0; s[i]!='\0'; i++)
		{
			if(s[i]>='a' && s[i]<='h')
				s[i]+=18;
				
			else if(s[i]>='i' && s[i]<='r')
				s[i]-=57;
				
			else if(s[i]>='s' && s[i]<='z')
				s[i]-=18;
				
			else if(s[i]>='0' && s[i]<='9')
				s[i]+=57;
		}
		
		printf("%s\n", s);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
